SELECT c.coupon_id, c.name, c.description, c.discount_amount, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.type, c.active FROM coupon c WHERE c.active = 1 AND c.type = 'normal' AND CURDATE() BETWEEN c.start_date AND c.end_date AND c.coupon_id NOT IN ( SELECT coupon_id FROM usercoupon WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
